title: Problem with continuous high cpu loading by "android.process.media" process
content:
My phone has the latest Android 9 version for this moment. By developer tools I observe high (100%) CPU Loading by "android.process.media" process. As a result, I have significant performance degradation in games and shortened battery time. Please help me to fix it, I would like to provide all information from my phone that you request.
Now I've disabled "Media Storage" service and problem disappeared. But photo gallery stops working when I do it and sometimes I have to temporary enable it again.
